trans-unit.source: Represents child controls of containers that support the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern" /> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Representa os controles filho de contêineres que são compatíveis com o padrão de controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollPattern" />.

trans-unit.source: See [Control Pattern Mapping for UI Automation Clients](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) for examples of controls that can implement this control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [mapeamento de padrão de controle para clientes de automação de interface do usuário](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/control-pattern-mapping-for-ui-automation-clients.md) para obter exemplos de controles que podem implementar esse padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: Esse identificador é usado por aplicativos clientes de automação de interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: Provedores de automação de interface do usuário devem usar o campo equivalente em <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPatternIdentifiers>.

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador padrão é passado para métodos como <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> para recuperar o padrão de controle de interesse especificado <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPattern> control pattern is obtained from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ScrollItemPattern> padrão de controle é obtido de um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
trans-unit.target: Rola a área de conteúdo de um objeto contêiner para exibir o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement" /> dentro da região visível (visor) do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: This method does not provide the ability to specify the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> within the visible region (viewport) of the container.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não fornece a capacidade de especificar a posição do <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> dentro da região visível (visor) do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: In the following example, a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A> event handler has been declared that attempts to scroll a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> object into the viewable region of its container control.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo a seguir, uma <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.AddToSelection%2A> ou <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.RemoveFromSelection%2A> manipulador de eventos foi declarado que tenta acessar um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern> objeto para a área visível do controle de seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The item could not be scrolled into view.
trans-unit.target: O item não pode ser rolado para a exibição.
